eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: The squad technician, Laura, discovers a large amount of Originium sediment inside the power plant's furnace. The repair work must be suspended, and only basic heating functions are left intact.

attributes.content: I must be seeing things.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: According to the results of the investigation, almost no part of the tower is intact. Everything's either damaged or ruined, and a lot of parts are flat out missing. It should've collapsed ages ago.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Same over here. Almost all the spare parts are gone. Even the conveyor belt has been dismantled.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Technician

attributes.content: *sigh*... A caravan stops by Davistown about once every two months. We have to trade for our necessities, usually with defunct industrial equipment.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Hmph, you call that a trade? More like robbing us blind! See that forklift? Hardly ever used and practically new! Well, at least eighty percent new!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: And do you know how much the traders offered for it? Ten boxes of canned food!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Well, we gotta eat.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: ...By the looks of it, the plant was already in extreme disrepair even before the accident.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: We used to have a whole lotta workers on the job, but now Miles is the only one left. It'd be great if he could keep things running on his own, but we'd need about ten more of him.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Tell me about it. Wish I could split myself into a hundred copies and put 'em to use right about now... This job's not as simple as the checklist makes it seem. If we don't play our cards right, we could be stuck here for a whole year.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: C'mon, don't say that... I was counting on that 200 grand after a week.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: 200 grand is nothing. Land yourself a security job with a venture capitalist in Trimounts, I guarantee you'll earn a whole lot more than that.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: When my employer was satisfied with my services, he waved his hand, gave me 200 mil, and whispered in my ear: 'Consider this an investment in you. You've earned it.'
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Seriously? 200 mil?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: With that much money, we could renovate all of Davistown.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Heh, just messing with you. I once blew that much money on a little project at Blacksteel, though... Totally not worth it, by the way.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Stop dreaming, girl, and get back to work.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Just so you know, old timer, count yourself lucky when you can hear Laura go off on her random tangents. Her mind's always racing while she's working, so she talks nonsense as a way to release the pressure. If she suddenly stops, it means...
attributes.name: Blacksteel Technician

attributes.content: It means what?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: ...It means the problem's too big, and her brain's short circuiting.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Technician

attributes.content: (*gulp*)
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: ...Okay everyone, listen closely. Stop whatever you're doing, and leave the energy tower back the way you came, hurry!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I mean now!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Sylvia, can you finish processing the bank statements before nine tonight?
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: N-No problem.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Then I'll leave you to it.
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: Ugh, how long has the manager been talking with those two?
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: ...the situation... the account does not look very optimistic...
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: ...that is not... wise course of action...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Wait, Liskarm, I think I heard something!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: A blackout... The energy tower?!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Sorry, something urgent came up. We'll need to confirm the situation first and explain things later.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I don't mind, go right ahead.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Aw, looks like the backup power is working. I was hoping we could clock out early because of the blackout.
attributes.name: Indifferent Bank Employee

attributes.content: What's the rush? Not like there's anything to do after work.
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: I've just about had it with this damn place. No bars, no nightclubs, just a tiny diner serving barely-edible slop. And now even the half-dead energy tower isn't working anymore.
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: Hey Sylvia, why didn't your mother open up more restaurants when she was mayor? Did she lose her sense of taste or what?
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: Sylvia?
attributes.name: Bored Bank Employee

attributes.content: Huh, did she slink away while the power was out?
attributes.name: Indifferent Bank Employee

attributes.content: What...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The plate... what's going on?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Laura?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hello, Laura? Do you copy?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Laura?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Woodrow!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Did something happen back in town?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I... I don't know, but things don't look too good so I'm heading back!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Gimme a ride.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...Okay!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Where are you, Jessica?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Captain Liskarm? I haven't been able to get in touch with Laura! What's going on over there?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: We were briefly able to make contact with her, but the signal is awful. All we know is that an emergency occurred during the repairs, but she isn't in any immediate danger for now.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Don't panic. Just worry about yourself, and we'll meet up at Helena's diner. Understood?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...Got it!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Can you make this thing go any faster?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Sorry...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Stop crying, I'm asking you to speed up, not trying to bully you. Your captain just told you that Laura's not in any danger.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Not for now. There's obviously a major problem with the energy tower, so if she doesn't evacuate in time...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hypothetically, if she really did have an accident, how would you rushing over help at all?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I don't know... but I have to. We're partners, so if I'm not there for her, who else would be?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: (*mumbles*) Partners, huh...
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: The roads around Davistown ain't in great shape, so you'd best drive carefully. Watch the turn up ahead.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Thanks for letting us wait here, ma'am.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. The power's out anyhow, and it don't matter who helps with the emergency generator. You're here, and the diner's that much warmer for it. Just gimme a holler if you need anything.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Is that... one of our squad members outside the window?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Where's Laura? And the others?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... Still inside the tower.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: What exactly happened in there?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Laura suddenly told everyone to stop repairs and evacuate the tower ASAP.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Once we were out, she asked all the Infected members to stay behind and had everyone else, including Miles and Leone, get as far away as possible.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Then... she took those people back in, and said that if she's not out by eight, all the residents on the plate need to be evacuated immediately.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Could you confirm the exact situation?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: She... didn't say.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Can you try contacting Laura again?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That... won't work.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: What about the others? We've still got half the team in there!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Enough of this. I'm heading over there myself.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Sit down, Franka.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Captain, you should know this better than me. Even if there was an explosion in there, it wouldn't take out everyone's communicators all at once.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The fact that we can't reach any of them probably means that a shit-ton of active Originium got released, which is jamming the comms.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: No matter how you slice it, this is an emergency, Liskarm.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And what would rushing over there accomplish? Don't forget what she said: if we don't hear back from her by eight, we need to prepare to evacuate the entire plate.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If we went with your plan and something really did happen, who's going to evacuate the residents? The government officials in the bank's garage?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What, then we're going to let Laura and her team fend for themselves? While we just sit around?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Don't let your concern for them cloud your judgment, Franka.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I hate to bother you, but what time is it now?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Laura
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Oh... It's you, Sylvia.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Wh-What happened? You all look so... tense...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: An accident occurred while repairing the power plant, but we still don't know the details. We're waiting for follow-up report.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No wonder the power went out... If, um, if there's anything I can do to help...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Sir, where are you going?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Heading out for a walk. This place is too damn stuffy.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I respect your courage, Sylvia, but what we need right now is patience.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...Umm, my mother... she was the second to last mayor here. She worked here all her life.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: But, she got sick... and I had to get a job, so I joined the bank... I never meant to betray anyone.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: I don't know what Mr. Theremin told you, but you have to believe me when I say I want to help...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: You seem to be misunderstanding something. Leone hasn't said a thing about you.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: R-Really? Sorry for jumping to conclusions...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: If you're worried about the energy tower, then you can sit here with us and wait for the news.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No... I still think...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Fine... I'll wait here with you.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: If no one else has any objections, this is the plan we'll follow to carry out the evacuation, if it comes to it.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Thank you for the hard work, everyone. Franka and I will stand guard, so the rest of you can take a breather for the time being.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *sigh*... What time is it now, Captain Liskarm?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Seven, on the dot.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...Only one hour left.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Are we... really going to just sit here until eight?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Th-This is Jessica, reporting in! I've returned to the squad!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: How's Laura doing? When are we heading out?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If you're asking when we're leaving, that'd be eight o'clock. If you're asking when we're sending backup...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I'm not in the mood to argue with a certain Vouivre right now. Ask her yourself.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: An evacuation?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: There's less than an hour left. You sure you wanna play the waiting game?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Excuse me, but who might you be?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: This is Woodrow, a local, umm... hunter.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You two know each other?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm the one who took her back to town when she got lost outside. We bumped into each other just now, so she gave me a lift.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...Well, thank you for helping her out, sir.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: If something went wrong in the energy tower, why are y'all just sitting around out here?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: We trust in our colleagues' ability to resolve the crisis. They're all professionals at handling Originium pollution.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Really now? Your deputy sure ain't as calm about the situation.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Sir, if an accident really breaks out, then we need to be on standby to evacuate the residents immediately. And we can only do that by staying here.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Awful generous of you to share all that with an outsider.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: But I ain't one of your colleagues. If you're not going, I'll check it out myself.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: That would be extremely dangerous
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Thanks for the tip.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Wait, Woodrow!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...I'll go with you.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica?!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Don't be rash. Have some faith in Laura. Even if you went
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I know. But even if there's not a whole lot I can do... She's still inside that tower.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: If she makes it out safely, the least I can do is be there for her with a hug.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And if something were to happen... I'd have a chance to rush in there.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Alright then, let's get going, young lady.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: L-Laura?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Move over, Jessica...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I'm starving to death here. Don't go blocking the door to the diner...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: R-Reporting in, Captain Liskarm. I, and the rest of the squad, have safely returned...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Thank heaven you're alright...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Laura...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Phew... In any case, uhh, the explosion caused a large amount of Originium sediment to build up inside the plant's pipes, which is a critical situation that could've boiled over at a moments notice.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Out of safety concerns, I ordered everyone outside first and tried to come up with a plan. But no matter what course of action we chose, there was a not insignificant chance of activating the sediment.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Laura
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Captain, please stop asking. No matter how much you ask, there's not much else I could do to fix things up on such short notice. But I did manage to find a way to preserve the plant's basic heating functionality. So at least people won't be freezing to death...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: As for whether the plate can start moving again, that'll have to wait until
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Laura! That's enough!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Captain...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: This really was... the best I could do... I'm so sorry...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: No, what I was trying to say is that what matters is that you brought everyone back safely.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh, really? That's good then... Actually... I'm really hungry right now... Like, really, really hungry...
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Then let's go ahead and eat first.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Eat as much as you want, and get a good night's rest.
attributes.name: Liskarm
